item.description:
I work for the Inter-American Development Bank as part of the Social Development team. Our team is responsible for setting up the first Regional Development Agency in the department. Aiming to design, implement and rigorously evaluate the Regional Government's social interventions.

My research interests include development economics, financial literacy, behavioral insights, and political science. I am part of a project investigating the role of participatory spaces as a form of citizen participation in social development. For more details, you can read my vitae.
